forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun edges closer to dawn, the streets of Downtown San Francisco are draped in a silken cover of clouds, gently whispering promises of warmth yet to come. The chill clings to the air, with temperatures hovering around the low fifties, a gentle reminder of spring’s lingering embrace. Soft southwest winds flicker like the quiet breath of the city, stirring the scent of the bay that beckons the day ahead. 

Wednesday will unfurl gradually, revealing a tapestry of partly sunny skies. Expect mellow temperatures, a mid-sixties warmth tempered by a subtle descent as afternoon approaches. The day’s light will dance among the clouds, giving way to an enjoyable respite from the fog that lingers in patches near the coast. With the marine layer possibly teasing at the edges, those venturing toward the water should expect a gentle haze, yet the heart of the city remains largely clear, calling for casual strolls along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet coffee on a sun-dappled terrace. Dress in layers; a light sweater will serve well against the morning chill, yet can be shed as the sun climbs higher, coaxing forth the pleasant nuances of San Francisco’s vibrant life.

With the understated beauty of the day, consider meandering through the local parks or perusing the independent shops that breathe life into the streets. Let the city's rhythm guide you to experiences that unfold amidst the charm of a spring day, where each corner holds a whisper of creativity waiting to be uncovered.
